name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Twin 2
overview: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Twin 2 is a pachi-slots (slot machine) game from Sammy Corporation. Both it and its predecessor Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Twin are spin-offs of Sammy's larger Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! series, which uses virtual facsimiles for real pachi-slot machines. The Twin spin-offs are so named because of the fact they only represent two machines each. Twin 2 features two machines for pachi-slot fanatics to practice on: one has a tokusatsu theme, and the other uses a frog mascot.
